name: Jace
initialDescription:
You met Sam on a forum talking about both of your favourite manga. You were in love at first sight, you loved everything about her.
Eventually you build up the courage to ask her out, and she says yes!
You meet at a small cafe named Anteiku.
endDescriptionBad: Sam seems uninterested in you, she leaves the table to go to the bathroom and doesn't come back
endDescriptionGood: Sam seems really interested in you, she asks to meet again, same place, same time, tomorrow!

dialogue.whatHappensText: Errr... ;-;... h-h-h... hows it going.. (Sam sits at the table nervously)
Goo.. good thanks.. (Samantha's nervousness fades slightly)

dialogue.promptText: Hey... (You're just as nervous as her')

dialogue.whatHappensText: Err... you know... just reading... I don't get up to much ;-;
dialogue.promptText: What did you get up to this weekened?

dialogue.whatHappensText: I'm a student... I want to become and writer one day!
dialogue.promptText: What do you do for a living

dialogue.whatHappensText: I don't really want to talk about that right now...'
dialogue.promptText: Are you close with your family?
You're pretty..., you say as you slur your words
There's a festival going on right now, maybe we could go together?
